Reviews.Title: “Visit for lunch”
Reviews.Author: kurfelmouse
Reviews.Content: While staying in Branson, We decided to take a drive to Lakeside Resort and General Store because it sounded interesting, reading the reviews on Trip Advisor. We were not disappointed! Such a pretty location, with a friendly, comfortable welcome by the owners who were very happy to tell us all about the resort and their history with it. We ordered lunch, which was delicious, and then had some of their homemade soft custard ice cream. It was worth the trip! Will definitely return on our next trip to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Fun, Friendly, Cozy Resort!”
Reviews.Author: dennis v
Reviews.Content: This is also our first time staying at a Cabin / Lake resort; the place is beautiful. The owners, Rick and Stephanie are friendly and hard workers, making sure your stay is enjoyable. The food is fresh, homemade and delicious. We stayed a week and will be going back next year. The view is incrediable, along with the boat we rented to explor the lake, fish and swim. The General store has almost everything you could want, including a replacement fishing pole we broke reeling in the big one. Rick suggested a Pflueger which is so much better than my pencil sharpener(ZEBCO). Thanks for a wonderful vacation and we will see ya'll next year. Also thanks to Zack, Carson and Cassidy, the beautiful, friendly and informative children.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Heather and Kri... L
Reviews.Content: This was the first time my Fiance` and I went to stay at the cabins and they were the most friendly people to deal with and we were very welcome!! We had a blast fried pickles were amazing as well!! If you are a young couple stay in old glory cabin it was amazing!!! We will be going again next summer!!!

Reviews.Title: “Repeat customers who have tried other Table Rock Lake resorts”
Reviews.Author: Jeri K
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Lakeside Resort for 10+ vacations. Rick & Stephanie have turned this resort completely around from the previous owners. We vacation every year with several families & have stayed at various other resorts on Table Rock Lake, until we found Lakeside. None have compared to the location, cabin conditions & lake swimming amenities. We will not stay anywhere else & are already checking dates for next summer for our large group. The Kettell family are cut out for this business, Stephanie is an organized, multi-tasker, who easily takes care of multiple folks at a time. Rick is the most outgoing, friendly guy you'll meet on the lake. Wouldn't go anywhere else!!

Reviews.Title: “Yikes!”
Reviews.Author: kandrlee
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Lakeside Resort this July and were shocked at the condition of the cabins.When we got there, we were supposed to be able to check in at 3, they were still cleaning and was not ready until 4. We sat in our hot car and waited for our room. It was tiny, dirty and fly infested! We have been on tons of vacations and this has to be the worst place we have ever stayed! The pool was not bad and the dock was in good condition, but I can't get past the cabin condition. Our cabin said: sleeps 9-10. There was one tiny bathroom (the door handle fell off when we got there). They came to fix it and it fell off again. They returned again and fixed it the second time. The toilet would not flush correctly (imagine staying in a cabin with 9 people and having 1 toilet that did not flush). The only other toilet on the premises is a disgusting port-a-potty! This place must have been built in the 60's or 70's and has not had an upgrade since. It was falling apart! Will def. not go back and will warn others also!

Reviews.Title: “Found my resort after 5 year search”
Reviews.Author: Dick R
Reviews.Content: The owners, Rick and Stephanie make this resort the best I've stayed in. The location right on Table Rock Lake, general store and restaurant are outstanding; but Rick and Stephanie make you feel right at home. I stayed at an RV site with full hookups and cable, for almost two weeks. I also kept my pontoon boat in a covered slip on their dock. I will be going back, I hope for many years. Thanks Rick and Stephanie

Reviews.Title: “Definitely going back!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Betty B
Reviews.Content: We visited in early June and rented three cabins for four days. Cabins are very clean, atmosphere very relaxed and the owners could not have been more friendly and accommodating. We will absolutely be going back. Food is great and reasonably priced. Beds were comfy and clean but the owners, the Kettle family is what really makes me wish I could give more than 5 stars. Stay here if you want relaxed, clean, friendly, reasonable and FUN!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great family friendly resort!”
Reviews.Author: Donna S
Reviews.Content: We visited for a quick weekend-getaway with 8 grandkids (and their parents). We stayed in 2 cabins, both of which were clean and comfortable. The owners are exceptionally friendly and were really wonderful with our grandkids. The resort is directly on the lake with a gorgeous view. The boat dock is great (swim dock, picnic tables, swing, fish) and with the restaurant/general store on the premises, there is everything you need to make an enjoyable vacation. We have stayed at this resort several times in the past, but this was our first visit since the Kettell family took over the resort. We will definitely visit again. Donna S.

Reviews.Title: “What a welcomed relief from the daily grind!”
Reviews.Author: MarkWayne1953
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a Lake Side Resort to relax and be next to the water this is the place for you! It is so refreshing to find Christian folks who want to serve others not only with their resort but their daily life! They do not sell Cigarettes or Alcohol so I give them 5 stars for taking a stand for what they believe. This is a VERY family friendly Resort! One of the boys even went into the lake and retrieve a lure I had lost in some limbs. :) They go over the top to make you feel welcomed and at home! The boat dock they have is awesome! Picnic tables are on the dock to use for your pleasure! You can call the General Store from the dock and they will fix your food and bring it down to the dock to you! The dock also has two porch swings that you can sit in and look out over the lake and just relax or you can swim in the lake. I can't say enough good things about Lakeside Resort!

Reviews.Title: “Great Get Away!”
Reviews.Author: Cindy M
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a quick getaway spot that was also pet friendly. What I didn't count on was being waited on hand and foot. Awesome food delivered right to your door. Clean cabins, great boat dock, awesome view of the lake. Thanks Stephanie! You were exactly what I needed!

Reviews.Title: “great food at lakeside resort.”
Reviews.Author: Larry C
Reviews.Content: i want to say thank you rick and stepanie for a great lunch at their resort. i'm local in the area and im always looking for a good place to have a bite to eat and the times i have stopped at lakeside have been great. if you grew up with home cooking then their little kitchen is a bright spot in the chrome world of branson. big portions, friendly and fast. they have a very nice resort to. the reviews speak for them selves. LAKESIDE IS THE PLACE TO BE. larry cekander

Reviews.Title: “Loved the View of Table Rock Lake from our unit”
Reviews.Author: rose k
Reviews.Content: The unit we stayed in was very clean and was very well furnished with everything we needed. I would recommend Lakeside Resort to anyone. Thank You.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: twins2_12
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to the Tablerock/Branson area since I was a kid. My aunt and uncle retired here in the 70s and we would vacation here every summer.Love it. We used to stay at Bittersweet Resort, though they closed down a few yrs back,so we began checking other places. We found Lakeside Resort close to where my aunt lived( she has since moved to North Carolina) to be closer to her daughter. We were welcomed and treated like we were a part of the Kettel family right from the start. We look forward to seeing them, and they have the nicest resort/pool/icecream shop/restaurant. They even have gluten free items available.The dock is beautiful, and you can swim there and if you prefer, order food and they bring it down to you :) The Kettells make your trip memorable.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful trip and terrific place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Sandra107
Reviews.Content: Booked this place based on TA reviews - can only say Thank You to all who took the time to contribute their opinions!! This was a trip for my husband's 60th birthday, and was all about fishing on Table Rock Lake. From the first time I contacted them, the Kettells were so gracious and welcoming. I found the reservation process easy and hassle free. The property is well cared for and it is obvious that the family takes great pride in it. Our cabin (Trout Run) had it's own 2 person jacuzzi tub - and I highly recommend it! Long trip from Michigan and long days on the water made for sore, stiff muscles that were greatly soothed by that tub! We appreciated the fact that there were pots, pans, silverware, plates, etc., and all appliances worked perfectly. A charcoal grill also came in handy for those hot days. There was a nice wrap around deck and chairs and also a small screened in porch area which we did not use. We did use the free WiFi and the cable TV - which meant we got to keep up with our favorite shows. The weather ranged from over 100 degrees to under 50 degrees so we had the opportunity to use both the air conditioning and heat - both of which worked exceptionally well! I cannot review the resort pool/hot tub - those were closed during our stay. However, I can review the Lowe's Bass boat the the dock. The Bass boat was a great value from our standpoint, came with a brand new trolling motor with foot control. There were also two Hummingbird GPS/Fishfinders. Large boat lockers were available to store our fishing supplies so we did not have to carry everything back and forth from our cabin. Rick supplied valuable information about places to fish and my husband was able to land some of those famed Table Rock bass. Although it is really not a part of the resort, I absolutely loved the drive to the resort. It is about an 8 mile drive that twists and turns through some of the loveliest area I have ever seen. I suppose for some that road would be a negative - but for me it was a big plus. It meant we were not on some busy, noisy road, and lent a peaceful, quiet atmosphere to the resort that one closer to Branson would not have. The Lakeside also boasts groceries and a small restaurant, and my husband became a regular consumer of their delicious chocolate malts. This was a trip of a lifetime, and I am so pleased that it was spent with the Kettells, They are a gracious couple and we wish them all the best.

Reviews.Title: “What a great trip! The resort was fantastic and the Kettells went above and beyond to make sure our stay was perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Kellercc
Reviews.Content: The resort was immaculate and the owners really work hard to make your stay memorable. This is a very family friendly place and caters to the little ones. I would highly recommend this resort. We will definitely be making this our new favorite spot at the lake!

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Vacation on Table Rock Lake”
Reviews.Author: dtknray
Reviews.Content: We have held a multi-family boating vacation at Lakeside resort for 4 years in a row, and enjoyed each year thoroughly. The Kettelles family (owner) are great hosts and go out of their way to make sure you enjoy your stay. The boating access is great, with a modern dock in a sheltered cove and quick access to the Kimberling City marina area. The Kettelles have made significant improvements to the property each year so it just keeps getting better. The general store is a big plus, selling general food stuff and a delicious selection of quick restaurant foods (pizza, sandwiches, etc.) and snacks (ice cream, shakes, shaved ice, etc.) after a hot day on the lake.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the swimming dock!”
Reviews.Author: okannie
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Lake Home 15 which was a 2 minute walk from the lake. The home was clean and comfortable,easy to maintain. We were glad for the washer/dryer as we came home with clean clothes and kept up with everything while there. It has a nice wrap-around porch which I enjoyed in the mornings with my coffee, could see the lake through the trees and the area is quiet for relaxing and reading. My granddaughter,6, loved getting the spray-on tattoos, she came home with 6 of them...they are offered at the store for free but the artists(Kettell kids) work on tips and they did a good job and were fun to talk with. We rented a golf cart our last day and really enjoyed the use of it, we went to the lake on it but also just drove around Coney Island looking at all the houses and views. We all enjoyed swimming off the dock, 50 ft. of water so my grown sons and my granddaughter loved diving and cannonballing off the dock. We also had a picnic there the last day as there are picnic tables right on the dock. All in all, I would recommend Lakeside 100%, the family is very helpful if you have a question or a problem, the facility is wonderful. We will stay again. My only disappointment was the hot tub was not running,found out they only run in the Spring/Fall so keep that in mind if you are renting a unit with hot tub. I didn't realize that but still loved the unit we rented.

Reviews.Title: “Had a wonderful time and experienced a great stay!!!!!! Awesome place!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: sprtsmn001
Reviews.Content: Eventhough the lake was extremely high, we had an awesome time. The weather was great, the fishing was pretty good, but best of all we met some new and dear friends. Rick and Stephanie go above and beyond to make your stay as pleasant and carefree as possible. The resort was peaceful and had a great boat dock to keep my boat. All your necessities are in their general store if you need anything at all. Plus, Rick keeps a hefty supply all the lures and bait the fish are biting on. This was our first of many more trips to this relaxing resort. I highly recommend them and know you will have as much fun as we did. Thanks again for such a wonderful and unforgettable place to spend our 5th anniversary. Craig and Michelle Edwards

Reviews.Title: “Best Resort, Best People, what a blessing. I'm going back in a couple of months!”
Reviews.Author: Scott_from_Iowa
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough great things about Rick, Stephanie their family and their property. Everything exceeded our expectations. Rick and Stephanie make you feel like family, literally. They took care of my family and I better than the Ritz hotels I've stayed at. My kids can't wait to go back. They are great loving, humble, genuine people who have done a fantastic job and are truly serving a higher cause. Rick will give you all the information he can to make your visit a five star stay. Everything you need is available on site. They know everyone and will hook you up with the best of whatever type of activity you are looking for. It has been a blessing spending time at their property and knowing these folks. If you are considering Tablerock, STAY at Lakeside!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place, right on the water!”
Reviews.Author: georgeswife96
Reviews.Content: Very friendly and helpful owners! We stayed for three nights and had a blast. Fished off the dock, rented a pontoon and fished the lake, then the last day hooked up with their recommended trout guide and spent the entire day learning to fly fish and catching a few trout on Taneycomo.

Reviews.Title: “True Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: bodaddy75
Reviews.Content: The place was awesome! The people did everything above and beyond the call of duty, to ensure we had a great time. They talked to local fisherman, and helped us to locate great fishing spots. They made sure my 4 year old daughter had a great time, and had most of everything we could forget to grab in town at their store. The food was good, and the location was better! Real close to Silver Dollar City. We had a great time!

Reviews.Title: “Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: manley9616
Reviews.Content: A great escape, clean, comfortable. Young family owners are constantly hands on working hard to keep resort up to date, constantly improving and trying to make sure their guests have a great experience. Very accomodating, with general store and food they cook to order if you don't want to cook, golf carts, boats, swimming pool, hot tub, etc. Only draw back we saw since we are in the later years were the sloping terrain which is expected, the drives between and next to the cabins were somewhat unlevel and graveled areas had rock in with the gravel, making it hard for someone unsteady on their feet. Heavy rains this summer hasn't helped Road down to the dock has asphalt and much easier to navigate. The dock is incredible, well lit with seating and picnic tables. Rather than rock & stairs going to the dock, we would prefer to see concrete or asphalt and a ramp for more secure footing or wheelchair access. This is a great resort, great place for family reunion, we had 8 familys with kids and adults all ages. Owners offer the best customer service in town!

Reviews.Title: “What a great place to vacation”
Reviews.Author: grandkidsarebest
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Cabin 1 Waters Edge and loved the Lake view of Table Rock Lake. The cabin was very clean and we could sit on our porch and watch our grandkids swim and play in the lake. We purchased a new boat this year and my husband liked that he could see his boat in the Lakeside dock from our cabin. The food in the General Store was very good and our grandkids loved the free beads and magic shows that the owners daughter performed for them. We found Lakeside Resort on Trip Advisor and have already booked our vacation for next year.

Reviews.Title: “You want a Vacation on the Lake, then Lakeside Resort/General Store is for you!”
Reviews.Author: ShaneRPage
Reviews.Content: I put my review under other as I was a last minute tag along with 5 other families and numerous children. Upon arriving at the resort it was apparent that this resort was different. Rick, Stephanie, and their children really project and make sure that you feel like family. We encountered a problems with out Jet Skis and Rick was right there on the spot helping, offering advice, we put in a new battery, some Sea Foam, and got her running (it was an old ski, that needed to be retired) lol I can not say enough about how well I was treated by Rick and his family. If you are a thrill seeker then ask Rick about the local cliffs. The Kettells children can be found working and roaming the resort doing odd jobs or having fun fishing. They were some of the best mannered children I've met. Kudos to Rick & Stephanie. When you visit Lakeside Resort and General store, make sure to visit the cliffs and take the plunge. Thanks to Carson and Zach for guiding me up the bluffs. FOOD: If you are hungry from a long day on the lake and whooped from jumping 65' cliffs (which you will be) Order up a "Grinder", world famous fresh potato salad, and a Dr Pepper" from Stephanie, you wont regret it and will probably come back for more. Thanks Stephanie BOATS: They offer a wide variety of boats, from Pontoon, to ski, to paddle. All in all this resort has EVERYTHING you need for a Lakeside Solo/Family/Group Vacation. I give it 5 STARS! Rick I look forward to seeing you and the family next year. V/r, Shane

Reviews.Title: “An awesome and hospitable lake resort”
Reviews.Author: Urh4MO
Reviews.Content: Lakeside Resort & General Store aims to please and make your stay comfortable, enjoyable with plenty of peace and tranquility. The owners and their family attend to your every need with great food cooked on spot and delivered to your needs, a general store for those items you forgot or need for cooking/grilling at your cabin, wonderful cold specialty treats, a great supply of souveniers, including personalized T's. Additionally, awesome lake view with watercrafts of sorts to rent and discover beautiful Tablerock Lake. A pool to relax in once your off the lake or relax in the lake at the dock. The neighboring cabin visitors are quiet and it seems everyone respects each others privacy and vacation time. This was our first visit and we plan to go back annually and have reserved our spot next summer two x. We are going to do another short trip mid Sept.

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT PLACE FOR FAMILY FUN!”
Reviews.Author: fichterbrucefamily
Reviews.Content: We have been to this resort for 2 years now. And looking forward to go again next year. The cabins were very comfortable and clean. Love swimming off the boat dock and how you can sit back and relax. We had cabin 1&2, the view was beautiful. My grandkids loved to go fishing and swimming in the lake and pool. Rick, Stephanie and kids are wonderful people. We love visiting with them every year. They are always ready to help in anyway and the General Store is great. It has good food and everything you possibly will need while staying there. I find this very nice because you don't have to drive all over. If you have not stayed there, you have to go and check it out. It is worth it!!! Just want to THANK Rick & Stephanie for everything that they have done for me and my family. I am so glad that we found your resort. Have a great rest of the year and see you next year in July.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: jaimesta
Reviews.Content: The food is great. The resort is right on the lake. The fishing is good. The cabin we stayed in was clean and we got everything we asked for. They also have golf cart to rent. The dock was nice and clean. This is a nice place to stay..

Reviews.Title: “This is the best place to stay on Table Rock Lake!”
Reviews.Author: LindaRobinson4825
Reviews.Content: We have been vacationing in the Branson / Table Rock Lake area for 25 years and this is the BEST location we have found. The resort is owned by the nicest family you could ever meet. They have a range of cabins to meet any family size, and they are clean! The General Store & Restaurant that is located on the resort is very convenient and they have great food. The location of the resort is just a short drive from Silver Dollar City.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Fun”
Reviews.Author: skipreader
Reviews.Content: For an inexpensive, family friendly, small cabin resort, the Lakeside Resort & General Store can't be beat! The ownerw, Stephanie and Rick Kettlells, are as friendly as they come. The location is as close to Table Rock Lake as you can get and is very convenient to Branson, Silver Dollar City and most area attractions (including golf). The resort is clean and well cared for though somewhat dated. We call it quaint and love it! The general store (and "carry out" restaruant) is a plus for quick meals, special treats and forgotten items. The swimming pool and boat dock (with picnic tables) are wonderful. We understand that RV sites have been added this year although we have not personally seen them yet. We first stayed here in 2008. 2009 was our second year coming to this resort and 2010 will be our third. We do a simple family "quasi" reunion here, ranging from 10 to 27 people, and have a blast every time. My wife and I would recommend the Lakeside Resort & General Store, and it's owners Stephanie and Rick Kettells, to anyone, with or without children, for a fun, simple, inexpensive vacation. Bring your boat, your fishing gear, or RV if you have them. We think you'll enjoy this place: we certainly do! Steph and Rick, we'll see you again very soon! Skip & Sharon

Reviews.Title: “Great place to bring the family!”
Reviews.Author: Nae1988
Reviews.Content: Loved the swimming area right off the boat dock! This fabulous dock area gave the family a wonderful place to hang out, swim, float, and fish. The dock area has a place to eat also and we ordered pizza/walking tacos/icecream all from the resorts General Store. The owners or their kids delivered the food right to us while we were swimming! What a nice break for Mom! The pizza was the best pizza we have ever had! The cabins were clean and beds very comfortable. We rented a boat for a few hours which was enjoyable and gave us the opportunity to see more of the really clean, Table Rock Lake and its surroundings. The traffic on the ground and lake is not busy at all which we found made the vacation even more relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Vacation on Table Rock Lake”
Reviews.Author: LVTRL
Reviews.Content: Nice and very clean, owners were very nice and friendly. All cabins were all newer styles and updated, not like some down there that still look in the 50's.. Great Large Dock and stalls for our boat and place to swim for the kids in the lake and in their pool. Very Nice General Store with Great food to boot! Has to be one of the NICEST resorts we have found on Table Rock Lake.. Will recommend to all of my friends..

Reviews.Title: “Delightful waters-edge destination”
Reviews.Author: lovetoberetired
Reviews.Content: My last visit to Lakeside Resort was late fall 2009. The drive from West Branson is scenic with views of Table Rock Lake nearly the whole way. If you want to be close to the tourist activity, you should choose a motel in Branson. However, if your desire is to have a quiet place to enjoy the serenity of the lake, you can't beat this location. The cabins are clean and beds comfortable. I love to be able to enjoy the music of birds early in the morning, sitting on the porch looking out over the lake. The thing I love most is NO traffic noise. Delightful! .

HotelInfo.Name: Lakeside Resort & General Store
HotelInfo.Address: 153 Coney Drive, Branson West, Branson, MO 65737
